A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie left me distraught. Every expectation that was set up both in The Force Awakens and within this movie itself was subverted. As the starwars nerd in the group everyone was asking me confused questions at the end. I really wanted to like this movie but by the end I didn't know what or if I should care anymore as everything seemed to just want to subvert my expectations. You can only do that so often before as an audience member I stop caring and this movie did it way too much.
